definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: In the feudal society of absolutism derive the lilliputian of flatter the most easily.
sentences.chinese: 在專制主義的封建社會中，最容易衍生諂諛的小人。

sentences.english: Slow Gradual Fading of the Young Absolutist.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的的專制主義者正在逐漸消亡。

sentences.english: Another cognate cause of crime of violence was the family tyranny.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行爲的另一個同類的原因是家庭內的專制主義。
